item.description:
This is a great place to gather with our new friends, enjoy fun (always interesting) stories, and WALK. We have all speeds of walkers but no one (unlike kayaking) gets too far ahead and goes in the wrong direction, and (like kayaking) no one will be left behind (4 2 long). We’re here for good times, and exercise. Everyone Talks & Walks at their own pace and that’s what makes this event great for all. So if you haven’t come before, please join us this time.

This week will be a bit different from the past weeks. For those that can make it, we will start the walk earlier at 5:15pm. Everyone else can meet us at the same place at 5:30-5:45pm when we come by.

Then after the walk, at ~ 6:30 we’ll head down to the BBC in Westford for a light dinner and beer! Anyone new joining us for the walk – great, we want to meet you and hear YOUR interesting stories!

Please, when you RSVP also make the comment “BBC” if you’ll be joining us at the BBC (British Beer Company) after our walk. This is important because we need a headcount in advance.

We’ll meet between 5:00 - 5:15pm at the concert park benches just across the street from Heritage Ice Cream & Restaurant. For those that don’t know me, you will. I’ll have a MEETUP pin on the back of my cap. My cell #; (603) 204-1657 and the volume is now turned UP.

This is also a DOG FRIENDLY WALK, so bring them along if you wish, but if you’re going to the BBC after, please make appropriate plans in advance.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Let's Walk & Talk Along the River!
